result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Status conference on July 29, 2022 at 09:00 am.

09:13 AM Defendant ERIC R JOREN in court via Zoom.  Joseph J. Kaupie appeared for the State of Wisconsin via phone. State notes deft has not completed a waiver of right to attorney. State is prepared to make an offer but needs to be able to contact deft or atty. Deft has contacted SPD, not eligible, has completed paperwork for court appointed attornet. ADA makes statments re: atty appointment and fees. Court conducts indigency hearing. Court questions Defendant re: Employment/Income. Wage Assignment: $50 per mpnth. Court grants appointment of Counsel; Defendant found indigent. State accepts courts decision. Court to notify Shawano County Clerk of Courts. Deft to contact COC to set up payments then representation can be appointed by Shawano County. Court to set up a status review heairng in July: no specefic date set.
Judicial Pretrial - in court on April 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.

01:31 PM Defendant ERIC R JOREN in court.  Joseph J. Kaupie appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Reading Waived Reserve Jurisdiction. Court questions Defendant re: complaint and rights. Advised Right of Counsel. Plea Not guilty by Court. State asks for added bond conditions of   No operation of a motor vehicle without a valid license and or valid insurance. half of cond to be applicable to funds for payment of counsel when obtained.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for April 12, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Initial appearance on March 1, 2022 at 01:15 pm.
